parameter.name: page_id_line_colour
parameter.documentation: Colour of identification line. Default based on page_y_length

parameter.name: page_id_line_magics
parameter.documentation: Display magics version in identification line (ON/OFF)

parameter.name: page_id_line_user_text
parameter.documentation: User-supplied text for inclusion in identification line

parameter.name: page_id_line_system_plot
parameter.documentation: Plot system part of the identification line (ON/OFF)

parameter.name: page_id_line_date_plot
parameter.documentation: Plot date part of the identification line (ON/OFF)

parameter.name: page_id_line_errors_plot
parameter.documentation: Plot error part of the identification line (ON/OFF)
parameter.release_info: Parameter defined but not implemented: no plan

parameter.name: page_id_line_user_text_plot
parameter.documentation: Plot user text part of the identification line (ON/OFF)

parameter.name: page_id_line_logo_plot
parameter.documentation: Plot logo part of the identification line (ON/OFF)

parameter.name: page_id_line_font_style
parameter.documentation: Style of the Font to be used
